locale.message: This is the hostame to Moneris' payment gateway. For testing, use <u>esqa.moneris.com</u>; for production systems, use <u>www3.moneris.com</u>.
This is the Store Identification assigned by Moneris to your organization/journal.
This is the API Token assigned by Moneris to your organization/journal.
Select this if you would have the Card Verification Digits enabled on your Moneris account.
You may enter any additional information that you would like displayed on the payment page, such as privacy information or refund policies.
Warning: CURL support for PHP is not installed. Moneris payment support requires the CURL library and will not function until it is installed.
The Moneris Plugin enables users to use all major credit cards when paying through the system. The Journal Manager will need to set up a Moneris eSelect Plus account to use this payment option.
Clicking Pay will process your credit card. This may take a few seconds. Do not refresh your browser, as this will cause your card to be processed a second time.
Please fill in all the fields below
Your payment has been processed and a receipt has been sent to your email for your records. Your registration status has been updated.
We were unable to process your card. If you believe this was an error, please try again.
Your payment has been received, but there was a problem updating your registration status. Our staff has been notified of the error and will be correcting it shortly. Do NOT resubmit your payment.
